name: Bowarcher Tower Attack
description:
It's time to have a great time with this entertaining action and defense game in BowArcher Tower Attack! Will you be able to help our brave archer to ruthlessly assassinate one by one the dangerous monsters and bloodthirsty wizards willing to end your life to gain access to the interior of your castle walls?

It's time to defend with your life every brick of your small and walled city thanks to your amazing aim and your infinite air attacks with which you will destroy waves of opponents in the blink of an eye. Earn money with each wave cleared and spend your earnings on upgrading your earnings and stamina by unlocking numerous attacks! Good luck...
